page.title: 13Types of Farms:Upper Juniors
page.content: {Tithe Hall:}Mainly Dairy(135),some stock rearing and crops.250 acres. Tenant Farmer:Mr.Terry. {Penadlake &:}Mixed Farm,beef,sheep and {Penkestle }crops.250 acres.Tenant Farmers: Mr.Bolitho & son. {Hollycoombe:}Mixed Farm,beef & corn. 100 acres.Tenant Farmer:Mr.Dennis. {Higher Drift:}Dairy Farm(40), some stock rearing.80 acres.Tenant Farmer: Mr. Dennis. {Clinnicks:}Dairy Farm(40),some stock rearing.125 acres.Tenant Farmer: Mr.Finch. {Kenna Coombe:}Dairy Farm(55),some stock rearing.187 acres.Tenant Farmer: Mr.Whell. {Grey Mare:}Mixed Farm,dairy(60) and crops.170 acres.Owner:Mr.Clark.
